parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs. You can call [DescribeLivePullStreamConfig](~~2847818~~l) operation to query the application name.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the live stream. You can call [DescribeLivePullStreamConfig](~~2847818~~l) operation to query the stream name.
